title: Start
body:
<<BGM GlobalStats Heavy>>
<<BG BG Backstage>>
<<outfit Aig Stage>>
<<outfit J-Pe Stage>>
<<outfit Lee Stage>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
That...
...was...
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
AMAZING!
<<flip Aig>>
I CAN'T BELIEVE WE JUST DID THAT!
<<flip Aig>>
CAN YOU BELIEVE WE JUST DID THAT?!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NONF>>
I can. I was there.
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
Breathe, Aiggy! We can't have you suffocating before we CELEBRATE!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NHSF>>
After party's at my place! Who's in?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
We...all live together.
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
Then I'll put you down as a "yes!"
<<expression Aig RLNF>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NSNF>>
Heh.
<<name Friendship ...>>
Are we done stroking our own egos yet?
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RHWU>>
UGH.
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
C'mon Kimmy. Even YOU have to admit that was pretty good!
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
It was PRETTY good.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
I've seen worse. I've also seen MUCH better.
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
But overall, not bad boys. Nicely done.
<<expression J-Pe RHSF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Wow! Turns out it WON'T kill you to compliment us every once in a while!
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Watch it.
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Wait...does this mean...
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
It does. I just got word from PYRO inc.'s corporate office.
<<expression Kent RNNF>>
As of this moment, you are officially a REAL boy band.
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Congrats, boys!
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
A-AMAZING!
<<expression J-Pe RLWF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
AWWWW SHIEEET!
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Word.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Here, they told me to give you this.
<<unlock Unlocks XIX>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
Wow! It's a...
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...uh...
<<expression Aig NOSF>>
...what is it?
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
It's the name of your band...
<<expression Kent NNNB>>
...apparently.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Wait, what?
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
I get it.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
I guess it's spelled X-I-X?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
XIX?
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
Oh...yeah! I can see it!
<<expression Aig NOSF>>
Kiiiiiinda....
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<vanish Unlocks>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
XIX?
<<expression J-Pe NOSF>>
Uh, how do you pronounce that?
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
How should I know?
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Marketing says it'll look good on album covers or something.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Look, it's not important. 
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
What is important is preparing for your career.
Now that you're officially a band, the REAL battle begins.
I expect all three of you to be at training tomorrow morning. We've got a lot of work ahead of us.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NSNB>>
Don't stay up too late.
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNSF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
XIX, huh.
Like..."zicks?"
<<name Friendship Lee>>
"Shish."
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NOSF>>
Or "zizz?"
<<name Friendship Lee>>
"Zish."
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Or maybe it's a roman numeral...so like..."nineteen?"
<<expression Lee NOWB>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
"Zi-" uh...
<<expression Lee NOWF>>
"Zi-zish...kebab."
<<expression J-Pe ROWU>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
WHATEVER!
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
The point is we're a REAL band now!
<<expression J-Pe RHSF>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
Which means we've got to uh-PAR, uh-TAY!
<<expression J-Pe ALWB>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
C'mon, gents. Drinks are on me!
<<expression J-Pe NLNF>>
<<move J-Pe OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
Cool.
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee RHSF>>
Cool cool cool.
<<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
<<move Aig CenterStage>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Wow...XIX.
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
I..I gotta call my dad!
